w:r.w:t: This document has automatic hyphenation enabled. Long words like internationalization, telecommunication, and conceptualization may be hyphenated at the end of lines.
The hyphenation zone is set to 0.25 inches, limiting hyphens to 2 consecutive lines, and CAPITALIZED words are not hyphenated.
Antidisestablishmentarianism is a very long word that demonstrates hyphenation. Electroencephalograph is another example.
